press.title: 10 Digital Collage Artists to Watch in 2025
press.excerpt: Jolene Casko's surreal digital collages blend vintage imagery with contemporary themes, creating haunting visual narratives for musicians.

press.title: The Artists Behind Your Favorite Album Covers
press.excerpt: Casko's work with indie musicians has resulted in some of the most visually striking album art of the past year.

press.title: Exploring Surrealism in Modern Album Art
press.excerpt: Featured artist Jolene Casko discusses her process of translating musical emotion into surreal visual compositions.
